title: Who are the best new horror authors? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here they are. Bram Stoker:  Clive Barker  Edgar Alan Poe  James Herbert  Ray Bradbury  Richard Matheson  Stephen King  H.G. Wells  Shirley Jackson

I just finished reading a huge, sprawling, post-apocalypticvampire story called The Passage, by Justin Cronin. It got rave reviews and wasa great book, but you may want to just take a look at an online plot summary ofthe book to see if it entices you. I found a good one for thisbook on a site that I go to a lot called the Plot Spot. http://theplotspot.net/BookPages/The-Passage/The-Passage.html
